Plot: Lu and Feng are a devoted couple forced to separate when Lu is arrested and sent to a labor camp as a political prisoner during the Cultural Revolution. He finally returns home only to find that his beloved wife no longer remembers him.
Title: Coming Home
Writer: Geling Yan (based on the novel by), Jingzhi Zou (screenplay)
Actors: Li Gong, Daoming Chen, Huiwen Zhang, Tao Guo
